testsuite.name: snake.basic.PlacementTests

testcase.name: testNoRoomForApple

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: No apple should be placed if the entire playing field is filled with the snake body. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=2, actions=<> Want | Got ✓ --------------- OO>..A | OO>..A
step=1, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✓ --------------- .OO>.A | .OO>.A
step=2, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✓ --------------- ..OO>A | ..OO>A
step=3, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ..AOO> |
